docs.snippet: Spain's data protection agency says it will investigate whether the recently announced exchange of personal data between WhatsApp and Facebook meets Spanish data protection legislation.

headline.print_headline: Spanish Agency to Probe Facebook/WhatsApp Data Swap Deal
headline.main: Spanish Agency to Probe Facebook/WhatsApp Data Swap Deal

docs.snippet: News content posted by publishers will show up less prominently, resulting in less traffic to companies that have come to rely on Facebook audiences.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Tweaks Its News Feed to Focus on Friends and Family
headline.main: Facebook to Change News Feed to Focus on Friends and Family

docs.snippet: Researchers from Facebook’s Connectivity Lab have created a new light detector for receiving communication signals through laser beams

headline.main: Facebook Moves One Step Closer to Light-Based Wireless Communication

docs.snippet: A vote on the company’s governance was a brainteaser that suggests that institutional investors are more inclined to tick boxes than follow their heads.

headline.main: Facebook Shareholder Vote Produces Odd Results

docs.snippet: A man who filmed a couple who had overdosed on heroin and were lying unconscious on a Memphis sidewalk as people mocked them is defending his decision to post the video live on Facebook.

headline.print_headline: Man Defends Facebook Live Video of Heroin Overdosed Couple
headline.main: Man Defends Facebook Live Video of Heroin Overdosed Couple

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc launched a stripped down version of its popular Messenger app for emerging markets on Monday as it seeks to expand its international footprint.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Rolls Out Pared Down Messenger App for Emerging Markets
headline.main: Facebook Rolls Out Pared Down Messenger App for Emerging Markets

docs.snippet: Here is a guide to help you teach young people about philanthropy and offer them the tools to give.

headline.print_headline: How to Give Children the Gift of Generosity
headline.main: Six Ways to Give the Gift of Generosity to Children and Teenagers

docs.snippet: As Twitter continues to reshape its board, Bret Taylor was appointed for his experience in consumer technologies and his prominent role with Facebook.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Veteran Appointed  to Twitter’s Rejiggered Board
headline.main: Twitter Brings Aboard Facebook Veteran Bret Taylor

docs.abstract: Twitter appoints former Facebook senior executive Bret Taylor to its board.

docs.snippet: Take a moment before you log on to your phone or computer to evaluate your intentions.

headline.print_headline: How to Be Mindful With Facebook
headline.main: How to Be Mindful With Facebook

docs.snippet: What you see on the social media giant is based on an algorithm. It’s anything but neutral.

headline.print_headline: The Real Bias Built In at Facebook
headline.main: The Real Bias Built In at Facebook
